data.text: The Turks are on top of it.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Yes, there will be no delays.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Please, Mr. President! I am asking you to reconsider─no, begging.
data.speaker: Reeve

data.text: The Sector 7 undercity is home to more than 50,000─
data.speaker: Reeve

data.text: At least let us issue a warning, sir.
data.speaker: Reeve

data.text: The stench of the director's cowardice fills the room yet again.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: We have to get to Sector 7...
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: We have to get back to the slums─right now!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I didn't wanna drag Aerith into all this...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: How do you two know each other?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I saved her, she saved me... Round and round it goes.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: And...that's all there is to it?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Sure there isn't something else going on?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Dammit. I can't stop thinking about what Corneo said.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It's gotta be a trick. There's no way they'd go that far.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: But... But what if Corneo really was telling the truth...?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We have to get there in time to stop it. We have to.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Aerith, what are you not telling me?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Guys! C'mon! We gotta keep moving!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That's what I always tell myself.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: How 'bout this, then? Think of something fun.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Stuff for the bar! Decorations, coasters...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Cloud can carry all our stuff!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Looks like they're hungry for more.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We're not delicious! Not even a little bit!
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: But there's too many of them!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Last warning! Back off, or die!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You are gonna hold up your end of the bargain, right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Long as you hold up yours─yeah.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: I don't trust you, and I don't like you.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So if you so much as breathe in a suspicious way...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'll turn that face of yours into a honeycomb.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'd save your bullets for the monsters, if I were you.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Some are a lot tougher than you'd think.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Hate to say it, but I can barely take 'em on my own.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: You, on the other hand, shouldn't have any trouble, am I right?
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: So how we supposed to get topside?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Then you're telling me we're not done?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Sorry guys, but it's not that simple─
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: He took the key to the door!
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: It was all just a dream, wasn't it...
data.speaker: Leslie's Fiancée

data.text: Time to wake up. And forget.
data.speaker: Leslie's Fiancée

data.text: On that day Corneo picked her as a bride. And on the next she vanished without a trace.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: But before she did, she gave it back.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Thing cost me a small fortune.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Why did you wanna come down here?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I know I need to let go, but I can't.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: I need closure, 'cause without it...I'll never be able to move on.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: As long as you get us topside, we're still in.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Thanks. And don't worry, I got you.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Do you think it lives down here, or...?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Hey... You don't believe that crazy story of his, do you?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Shinra wouldn't sacrifice a whole sector just to take out Avalanche, would they?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Destroying part of the city─killing all those people, just to get at us?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I dunno... Is Corneo the kind of guy who'd make up shit just to screw with you?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I wouldn't put it past him.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: But...if he was telling the truth...
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: And there's still a chance he was, isn't there?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: And if it turns out he was lying, then so what? Right?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Got some urgent info for the don!
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Really? Without my little Avalanche kittens?
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: I thought I told you to round them up and bring them to me.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: Actually...it's them I came to talk about.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: I don't think I need to remind you why I'm down here.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: Spilling the beans to those three escape artists was a serious mistake.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: And now I'm on Shinra's shitlist!
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: The plate stunt was meant to be an unprecedented tragedy claiming countless innocent lives...
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: But those naughty little kittens organized an evacuation and screwed up the plan.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: I'll let you in on a secret. Shinra's going to abandon Midgar...
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: and build something close to paradise.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: I was invited to be a part of it─don of a new and improved Wall Market.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: I'll be lucky to live another week.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: I was gonna let you run your own place─give you a piece of the action.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: Villains like us only divulge our evil plans...
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: in a certain situation. But what is that situation, hm?
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: You were talking 'bout the Sector 7 plan. Keep talking, asshole.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Ahh! Over there! Over there, look!
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: It's not technically bullshit when it's true.
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: Good Abzu! Feel free to play with your food!
data.speaker: Don Corneo

data.text: I'll track him down eventually. Not like I have anything better to do.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: You know, I wouldn't be so sure about that.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: She could still be out there.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Can never be sure how much someone means to ya till they're gone.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Don't give up on her yet.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What was she trying to tell me?
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Then I guess I've got no choice but to find her first.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Hold up. I think ya might be forgetting something.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: And then I'll give you what you need.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: I'm pretty sure we can use these tunnels to make our way back to Sector 7.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: The sewers under Sectors 6 and 7 should be connected. "If you get in trouble, just follow the stench."
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: An Avalanche saying, actually. We use them to move around the undercity.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: That's a power generator, all right.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It's an antique─older than the mako reactors even. It'll be a miracle if it still works.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: But not if we used the skeleton key Jessie made.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Huh. Does this mean it's in the water?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: I know this place. Sector 7 should be just on the other side of this waterway.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: So this is where Sector 6 ends.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: And where Sector 7 begins. Once we cross over we can start looking for a way back to the surface.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Might be harder than you think.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Let's just try to make our way down this tunnel. See if we can't use those gates to clear a path.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We can do this. We'll figure it out.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Look. That must be the way out!
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Seventh Heaven's water tank has something similar. I'm betting we can use this to control the sewage level.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey Cloud─you wanna give it a try?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: A red light indicates a blockage, apparently.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We can use the hand pump to clear the blockage. Sounds about right.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I remember having to do this at the bar before.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Aerith, you mind giving me hand? Cloud, you stay put. Keep an eye out for more red lights.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Trust me. This is the best way to handle it.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: So maybe this is a little different from the one at the bar. More...industrial?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Alright, I think that did it!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Okay, let's head back. Cloud's probably getting worried.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Head for the trunk line─it marks the border with Sector 7.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: You three lead the way. I'll follow a short distance behind.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Right. Jessie and Biggs stashed a skeleton key down here.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I never got the chance to thank them for what they did.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hate to interrupt, but the trunk line's just through that door. The one over there.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Your time to shine. Clear the path ahead, would you?
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Why did you help us out before? You could've lost everything.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: And I couldn't bring myself to let it happen again...
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Where in the hell did that thing run off to?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Up. As if this wasn't enough fun already.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: We ain't got time to play hide-and-seek, ya little shit!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Think the kid's gonna be okay goin' it alone?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I knew it. These tunnels are all connected.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Positive. There should be a big waterway just up ahead. Let's find that first.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Well the undercity isn't exactly the prettiest place, and we're under that so...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Is it safe to go through here?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'm sure we'll be fine. Come on.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey, Cloud... Assuming Corneo was telling us the truth...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: What do you think Shinra's really up to? I mean, they've gotta have an endgame, but I can't imagine what it is.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Destroying a whole chunk of the city just to get back at us doesn't make any kind of sense.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah. I can't imagine any way they could profit from it. It's gonna cost them a fortune to rebuild.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Corneo's lying. He's gotta be. Guys like him do it all the time out of habit.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey, would you look at that!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: All right! Now we should be able to get across.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I wonder. There must be some way we can lower the water level.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Just shout if you need anything.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Sure is nice to go up for a change.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Hope the pillar's not much further...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hang back. I'll go on ahead and secure the exit.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: There should be a door with Corneo's mark on it around here somewhere.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: We're getting close to Corneo's hideout. From here on, I'll take the lead.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: The area up ahead─it's that thing's den.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: Keep your eyes peeled. You never know when its friends're gonna pop up, or where.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: So, gonna make us work for it, are ya!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm not gonna hurt ya, little fella. So just stay st─
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I know a shortcut. Follow me.
data.speaker: Leslie

data.text: That twisted piece of shit. I'm gonna enjoy beatin' him to a pulp.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Okay then. Y'all think we got everything?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's not gonna be easy selling this stuff.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Oh, I know. What about Marle? We could ask her to help. I'm sure she'd be happy to.
data.speaker: Tifa
